titleStmt.title: The crafty maid: or, The young man put to his trumps. He did begin to wooe this maid but she not believed one word he said; she put him off then, with a jear, and sent him away with a flea in's ear. To the tune of The despairing maid: or, Fye love, fye.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P[hilip]. Brooksby in Pye-Corner.,

notesStmt.note: Place, date of publication, and publisher's name from Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library and the British Library.
